titles.title: Come To The Table Of Mercy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come to the table of mercy, Prepared with the wine and the bread. All who are hungry and thirsty, Come and your souls will be fed. Come at the Lord’s invitation, Receive from His nail-scarred hands. Eat of the bread of salvation, Drink of the blood of the Lamb. (Repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
